# [Interview #1162: Shadows of Self-San Jose, Entry #45](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1162#45)

#### Question

Was Hoid ever two different people?

#### Brandon Sanderson

There have been other people named Hoid in the past, but you have never met them.
